pluginSpecifiedTemplates.value:
{
	startDate: {{moment(startDatePickerAssign.selectedDate).format('YYYY-MM-DD')}},
	positionFestCloudId: {{positionSelectAssign.selectedOptionValue}},
	workGroupFestCloudId: {{workgroupSelectAssign.selectedOptionValue}},
	employeeFestCloudId: {{init.employeeFestCloudID}},
	jobTitle: {{jobTitle.text}},
	role: {{roleSelectAssign.selectedOptionValue}},
	manager: {{managerSelectAssign.selectedOptionValue||null}},
	cooperationType: {{legalEntitTypeSelectAssign.selectedOptionValue}},
	assignmentcreator: {{appsmith.store.myFestCloudId}},
	token: {{init.pos}}
}
